data.quote: What is the point if those with the means and power do not fight?
data.author: Eren Yeager

data.quote: The only thing we’re allowed to do is believe that we won’t regret the choice we made.
data.author: Levi Ackermann

data.quote: When people are faced with a situation they don’t understand, it’s easy for fear to take hold.
data.author: Armin Arlet

data.quote: People who can’t throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.
data.author: Armin Arlet

data.quote: It’s us who gives meaning to our comrades lives.
data.author: Erwin Smith

data.quote: This world is merciless, and it’s also very beautiful
data.author: Mikasa Ackermann

data.quote: Right now we’ve got no choice but to try. We gotta believe there’s a way to beat him!
data.author: Jean Kirstein
